ml_tags: In loving memory of Nicolaas Jacobus Bezuidenhoudt Psalm 23: He leads me beside the still waters. He restores my soul" “The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want. He makes me to lie down in green pastures; "We knew little that night that God was going to call your name The day God called your name" Rest in Peace  Pappie, Oupa our hearts to lose you, You did not go alone, for a part of us went with you * 10/01/1954 + 30/07/2023 In Life we loved you dearly, in death we do the same. It Broke
